titles.title: If That Same Spirit That Raised Christ From The Dead

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If that same Spirit that raised Christ from the dead
Dwell in you, dwell in you;
If that same Spirit that raised Christ from the dead
Dwell in you, dwell in you,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He shall quicken your mortal body,
If the Spirit dwell in you,
He shall quicken your mortal body,
If the Spirit dwell in you.
